Plot: A faded professional wrestler must retire, but finds his quest for a new life outside the ring a dispiriting struggle.
Title: The Wrestler
Actors: Mickey Rourke, Marisa Tomei, Evan Rachel Wood, Mark Margolis
tomatoConsensus: Mickey Rourke gives a performance for the ages in The Wrestler, a richly affecting, heart-wrenching yet ultimately rewarding drama.
Awards: Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 56 wins & 83 nominations.
